# appendSections(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the sections with the specified identifiers to the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func appendSections(_ identifiers: [SectionIdentifierType])
```

## Parameters

- **identifiers**: An array of identifiers specifying the sections to add to the snapshot.

## Creating a snapshot

- **init()**: Creates an empty snapshot.
- **appendItems(_:toSection:)**: Adds the items with the specified identifiers to the specified section of the snapshot.

items.description: Adds the items with the specified identifiers to the specified section of the snapshot.
items.name: appendItems(_:toSection:)
